location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 57: William Hornby, Daniel Draper, Thomas Goddard, John Halsey, Thomas Day, John Torlesse and Robert Sparks, Council at Bombay Caste, to Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: This letter informs Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire, that it is not possible to comply with a request for woollens until the arrival of ships from England. Galley is informed that a box of medicines has been sent on the Morning Star.
